title: New York Rangers ( NHL ) average ticket price 2014/15
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 10 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 14/15 to 10/11.
Additionally, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 08/09 to 05/06.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly neutral which exists from 10/11 to 08/09.
gold: This graph depicts the average ticket price of New York Rangers games within the National Hockey League from 2005/06 to 2014/15 . In the 2005/06 season , the average ticket price was 45.83 U.S. dollars . The Rangers play their home games at the Madison Square Garden in New York City .
